fields.value: Ratings of simulated ferry services and matches estimation

authorAffiliation.value: Dept. of Psychology, Hunter College, CUNY

datasetContactAffiliation.value: Dept. of Psychology, Hunter College, CUNY

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Repository of rating data from 320 subjects. Subjects rated simulated ferry services in a virtual environment. Another group of 80 subjects evaluated the number of matches in images. 

Data fields annotation: 
Data for each experimental group is stored in three variables: 
subjects: subject IDs (numeric)
delays: simulated ferry service delay (in seconds)
scores: subject rating score for each service event (numeric from 1-100)

Rating devices: 
Click-bar: subject clicks on a scale to report rating score (scale range 1-100)
Slider_0: subject move a slider from a zero starting position (up to 100)
Slider_25: same as above with slider starting at position 25 of the scale
Slider_50, Slider_75, Slider_100: same as above with different starting (default) positions

Experimental groups: 
Ferry click-bar (two batches)
Ferry slider_0
Ferry slider_25
Ferry slider_50
Ferry slider_75 (two batches)
Ferry slider_100

Matches estimation data
* The field 'delay' here is equivalent to number of matches
Two groups: 
Matches click-bar
Matches slider (starting at the center, range: 1-1200)

files.label: FerryDataDepositFinal.mat
